nodes.text: The Probe Droid DX was a model of probe droid produced by the Okara Droid Company at the Okara Droid Factory on the planet Balmorra. During the Cold War, Imperial forces uploaded computer viruses to a number of probe droids outside of the factory.
Probe Droid DX's appear as enemies in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, where they can be found in the Okara Droid Factory on the Imperial version of Balmorra.
